Our services

Aditya Estates is a leading real estate agency in North India, specializing in the sale, purchase, and renting of properties in and around the Delhi NCR region, including Noida, Greater Noida, Yamuna Expressway, Ghaziabad, Gurgaon, New Delhi, and Faridabad.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”box1″][vc_single_image image=”7629″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/fresh-bookings/”]

Fresh Bookings- Best Terms and Service

Aditya Estates is a RERA-registered firm with a core competency in fresh booking or primary sale of properties.

[vc_empty_space height=”14px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”box1″][vc_single_image image=”7626″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/resale-best-deals/”]

Resale- Best Deals

Aditya Estates is an expert in both fresh bookings and resales of properties from major real estate developers and builders. The firm provides a wide range of services related to the resale of properties,

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”box1″][vc_single_image image=”7643″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/personalised-services/”]

Personalised Services

At Aditya Estates, the team is committed to providing aggressive marketing and personalized services to help clients find their ideal home or workplace that caters to their specific needs and preferences.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”box1″][vc_single_image image=”7662″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/complete-property-solutions/”]

Complete Property Solutions

Aditya Estates not only specializes in the sale and purchase of properties, but it also provides a variety of services related to properties. These services include legal assistance for any property disputes,

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”box1″][vc_single_image image=”7627″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/rent-or-leasing-services/”]

Rent or Leasing Services

Aditya Estates offers an extensive database of properties for rent or lease that caters to a variety of requirements, including residential flats or independent houses, commercial office spaces or shops,
